item.title: Openadmin
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.171 Difficulty: Easy Initial nmap Scan Running the initial nmap scan: nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap 10.10.10.171 Gave me the following: From the nmap scan, you can see that there isn't too much here. The machine is running Ubuntu Linux Port 22 - The ssh protocol, canâ€™t really access this without credentials Port 80 - HTTP port, usually hosts web pages etc. In this case, it's the Ubuntu Apache web server
